name: Act Utilitarianism
decision_method: Calculate expected utility of each action
lexical_indicators: maximize utility;greatest happiness;aggregate welfare;sum total;net positive;overall benefit

name: Rule Utilitarianism
key_principle: Follow rules that generally maximize utility
decision_method: Apply rules that typically produce best outcomes

name: Kantian Deontology
decision_method: Test if action can be universal law
lexical_indicators: universal law;categorical imperative;duty;obligation;never merely means;inherent dignity

name: Rossian Deontology
key_principle: Prima facie duties with intuitive balancing
decision_method: Balance competing prima facie duties

name: Aristotelian Virtue Ethics
decision_method: What would virtuous person do

name: Neo-Aristotelian Virtue Ethics
decision_method: Virtues defined by community practices

name: Gilligan Care Ethics
decision_method: Maintain relationships and respond to needs

name: Noddings Care Ethics
decision_method: One-caring attends to cared-for

name: Rawlsian Justice
key_principle: Justice as fairness behind veil of ignorance
decision_method: Choose principles behind veil of ignorance
lexical_indicators: veil of ignorance;original position;justice as fairness;primary goods;difference principle

name: Libertarian Justice
decision_method: Maximize individual freedom and property rights

name: Contractarian Ethics
decision_method: Choose what rational agents would agree to
lexical_indicators: social contract;mutual advantage;rational agreement;collective benefit;negotiated solution

name: Scanlonian Contractualism
key_principle: What no one could reasonably reject
decision_method: Principles no one could reasonably reject

name: Deweyan Pragmatism
decision_method: Experimental problem-solving with democratic input

name: Jamesian Pragmatism
key_principle: Cash value of ideas in experience
decision_method: What works in practice

name: Communitarian Ethics
key_principle: Socially embedded selves and common good
decision_method: Pursue shared vision of good life

name: MacIntyrean Communitarianism
key_principle: Virtues within social practices and traditions
decision_method: Virtues as defined by practices and traditions

name: Feminist Care Ethics
key_principle: Challenging masculine bias toward abstract principles
decision_method: Context-sensitive care over abstract principles

name: Feminist Power Analysis
decision_method: Examine how power structures affect moral reasoning

name: Derridean Deconstruction
decision_method: Question fundamental categories and assumptions

name: Foucauldian Genealogy
decision_method: Trace historical construction of moral categories
